renewed-contributions.title: On the Trail of a Fox
Seven Footprints to Satan
renewed-contributions.note: Sixth part claimed in CCE renewal record, but not noted in FictionMags table of contents. I have not examined the 1927 issues to see where the story ends.

renewed-contributions.title: Caged
renewed-contributions.note: Only issue mentioned in contribution renewals for this story, but the 1958 renewal for the 1930 book may also cover the earlier parts, published from March 15 onward.

renewed-contributions.title: Written in the Sand
renewed-contributions.note: Title as given in CCE renewal record.  FictionMags gives title as 'Written in Sand'.  I have not examined the issue personally.

renewed-contributions.title: The Man With Pin-Point Eyes
renewed-contributions.note: Title as given on issue cover. CCE renewal record has 'Man With the Pin-Point Eyes',

renewed-contributions.title: Bonds of the Northland
renewed-contributions.note: Title as given on cover.  CCE renewal record gives title as 'Ofaafo', a word that appears in the cover illustration above the title.

renewed-contributions.title: Unwanted Man
renewed-contributions.note: Title as given in CCE renewal record. FictionMags gives title as 'Unwanted Men'.

comment: Pick up at The masterman my Max Brand in 1959-JanJun.  Not finding in Argosy US 1932; appears to have run in 1933 instead.
